item.title: Finished Code
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Hey guys I finished my first basic script… Take a look.

[code]import java.util.*;

public class Funny {
public static String HEIGHT = “”;
public static String WEIGHT = “”;

public static void main(String[] args) {
	System.out.println("Let's start the game :P");
	height();
	weight();
	age();
	end();
}

public static void height() {
	System.out.println("What is your height? (In feet please)");
	Scanner heigh = new Scanner(System.in);
	int height = heigh.nextInt();
	if (height <= 5){
	System.out.println("Oh shit, You're a midget! " + height
			+ "Feet,  LOL big people, your world.");
	}
	else if (height > 5){
		System.out.println("Oh fuck you tall son of a bitch..... Dam, "
				+ height + "Feet tall... What the fuck.");
	}
}

public static void weight() {
	System.out.println("What is your weight ?");
	Scanner weigher = new Scanner(System.in);
	int weight = weigher.nextInt();
	if (weight >= 200){
	System.out.println("Okay Mr. " + weight
			+ " Pounds, *COUGH* Fatass *COUGH*");
	}
	else if (weight <= 100){
	System.out.println("Jesus you fucking stick! How the fuck are you "	+ weight + "Pounds!!");
} else {
	System.out.println("Average faggot.");
		}
	}

public static void age() {
	System.out.println("Hey fag, please tell me your age.");
	Scanner ager = new Scanner(System.in);
	int age = ager.nextInt();
	if(age <= 13){
	System.out.println("Dam... Only" + age + " Years old... ");
	}
	else if (age >=14){
	System.out.println("Dam... Your a geezer, already " + age + " years old... LOL");
	}
	System.out.println("Calculating Information...");
	System.out.println("...");
	
	System.out.println("You're a: Faggot.");
	ager.close();
	}
}

[/code]
